decisions.description: Ongoing = installer initiated reclamation, where the WO is still open. New = IM/customer initiated reclamation, where there is no pre-existing WO.
decisions.name: Type_of_case1
decisions.label: Type of case

decisions.description: Without pictures work cannot be created/scheduled for an Reclamation/Quality Event case.
decisions.name: Verify_that_Case_has_pictures

Flow.description:
Creates installation work items for reclamation work.
15.1.2024: Corrected handlling for Warranty work without Asset. Type of Case selection modified to enter correct branch. Warranty work case also does not need to contain pictures, so that warning was disabled. 2.1.2024: Added logic to notify the IMs of the ST about new work. 6.11.2023: Added Case lookup field filling for SA. To support transferring reclamation images from SA to Case. 11.10.2023: Addition to allow to create visit for warranty work request (without parts order). 6.10.2023: Fix for checking if there are reclamation products or not. 6.10.2023: Support for WOLI as case creation starting point. 29.9.2023: Merge of two ticket fixes. 26.9.2023: Reclamation Oppo lookup filling to WO. 30.6.2023: Added Asset Id to SA in case of Ongoing work. 28.6.2023: Use Arrival Window. 28.6.2023: Change the existing WO's Oppo relation from original Oppo to the new Reclamation Oppo. 26.6.2023: New field to replace the Asset.Service_Territory__c taken into use. 22.6.2023: Added logic to check and warn if reclamation plan/product/configuration option is not available. 16.6.2023: Added validation to the date fields input. 9.6.2023: Correct numbers on WO and SA links. 9.6.2023: Added lookup from WO to Case. 8.6.2023: Added logic to not allow work creation if case does not contain pictures. 8.6.2023: Considers case where there are no factory ordered reclamation products. 6.6.2023: First version
Flow.interviewLabel: Case - Create needed work items to handle reclamation work {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Case - Create needed work items to handle reclamation work

recordLookups.description: If no Recl.Configuration Options, then Reclamation Product(s) have not been yet created using Visual.
recordLookups.name: Reclamation_Configuration_Options
recordLookups.label: Reclamation Configuration Options

recordLookups.description: Get the Recl. Plan related to the Case. If no Recl.Plan, then Reclamation has not been created.
recordLookups.name: Reclamation_Configuration_Plan
recordLookups.label: Reclamation Configuration Plan

fields.name: ErrorTextCaseType
fields.fieldText: Error! This functionality is supported only for Reclamation and Quality Event case types.

fields.name: ConfirmationScreen
fields.fieldText:
You are about to create Work Order (if needed), Service Appointment and Work Order Line Item(s).


Are you sure you want to continue?

fields.name: testtext
fields.fieldText:
Finished with the work item creation.


Work Order: {!fxLinktoWO}

Service Appointment: {!fxLinktoSA}


Now you should manually schedule the Service Appointment to the appropriate Installer using the Field Service Dispatch Console!

fields.name: ErrorTextNoPIctures
fields.fieldText:
Warning!


Later on when closing this Case, picture attachments regarding the issue are required to be added.

fields.name: ErrorNoReclamationConfigurationProduct
fields.fieldText: Warning! There are no Reclamation Configuration Products for this Configuration Plan. Are you sure you want to continue?

fields.name: ErrorNoReclamationConfigurationOptions
fields.fieldText: Warning! There are no Reclamation Configuration Options for this Configuration Product. This means the Visual reclamation configuration likely is not done yet. Are you sure you want to continue?

fields.name: ErrorNoOppo
fields.fieldText: Error! There is no Reclamation Opportunity defined in this case. Cannot get needed data for work item creation.

fields.name: ErrorNoReclamationOpportunity
fields.fieldText:
Error! There is no Reclamation Opportunity in the Case. Cannot continue.


Are you sure you created Reclamation already?

fields.name: ErrorNoReclamationPlan
fields.fieldText: Warning! There is no Reclamation Plan defined in this case. And thus no Reclamation Products exist. Are you sure you want to continue?

fields.name: ErrorTextCaseType_0
fields.fieldText: Error! You are not the case owner.

subflows.description: Send Lightning notification to max. 5 IMs of the Service Territory regarding the new work that just was created.
subflows.name: Notify_IMs
subflows.label: Notify IMs
